# strokeStart

**Instance Property**

The unit distance along the polygon where the stroke starts.

## Declaration

```swift
var strokeStart: CGFloat { get set }
```

## Discussion

Use this property and [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKPolygonRenderer/strokeEnd] to render a portion of the polygon. Use [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKMultiPoint/location(atPointIndex:)] to get unit distance locations for point indices along the polygon.

## Accessing the stroke

- **strokeEnd**: The unit distance along the polygon where the stroke ends.
